revised_title: Stellar Photography and Photometry: Establishing a Relationship between Photographic Images and Photometric Magnitudes
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between photographic images of stars and their photometric magnitudes, developing a method to measure the diameters of stellar images on sensitized films. This method establishes a physical relation between the diameters of the images and their photometric magnitudes, providing a more accurate way to measure star brightness.
